trans-unit.target: TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_1<tab>Beggin' your pardons, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but if it's a room you're here for, I'll have to ask you to wait.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_2<tab>Or is there some other way in which I can assist you?
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_3<tab>Well, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, some might say that Cloud Nine is an Ishgardian institution. Been here longer than most folk can remember, we have.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_4<tab>There's some debate as to the meanin' of the name. Some say it's 'cause sleepin' in a bed of ours is like being wrapped in linens made of clouds.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_5<tab>Others think anyone who believes that rubbish ought to try spendin' a night in the Brume.

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_6<tab>Me, I say a bed's a bed. I think ours are better than most, but I'm not about to get into a pissin' contest to prove it─ Er, beggin' your pardons, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_10<tab>Добрейшего вам <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((вечерочка)) ((утречка)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((денёчка)) ((вечерочка)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((мисс)) ((сэр)) /var>. Чем я могу вам помочь?

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_A2_000_1<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Переночевать в гостинице)) ((Зайти в гостиницу)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Зайти в гостиницу)) ((Переночевать в гостинице)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_11<tab>Да, <var 08 E905 ((мисс)) ((сэр)) /var>. Очень хорошо, <var 08 E905 ((мисс)) ((сэр)) /var>. Прошу вот сюда, пожалуйста.

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_17<tab>Generally speakin', <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, what you do in the privacy of your own room is none of our concern, so long as it doesn't disturb our other guests.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_18<tab>Certain activities which invariably produce, er...loud noises, for instance, are expressly prohibited. You understand, I'm sure.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>В гостиницах нельзя заниматься ремеслом, починкой и вставкой материи.
TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_19<tab>Well, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, some might say that Cloud Nine is an Ishgardian institution. Been here longer than most folk can remember, we have.

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_20<tab>There's some debate as to the meanin' of the name. Some say it's 'cause sleepin' in a bed of ours is like being wrapped in linens made of clouds. Others think anyone who believes that rubbish ought to try spendin' a night in the Brume.

TEXT_WARPINNISHGARD_BAMPONCET_000_21<tab>Me, I say a bed's a bed. I think ours are better than most, but I'm not about to get into a pissin' contest to prove it─ Er, beggin' your pardons, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
